event_name: 2016 Championship Game of the WSA Future's Cup

players_involved.name: Caroline
players_involved.action: receives throw-in, turns and carries the ball, plays a great through ball out wide

players_involved.name: Langley
players_involved.action: receives the through ball, dribbles and strikes a low, hard shot to the back post — GOAL

narrative: Throw-in finds {Caroline} in midfield — she turns, carries the ball, and threads a perfect through ball out wide to {Langley}. {Langley} dribbles, picks her spot, and fires a low, hard strike to the back post. GOAL!
caption_hook: Pick a corner. Bury it. That's a GOAL!
